comments: The most amazing professor i ever had! He wants you to succeed and will go out of his way to help you! I will definitely miss his classes! I highly Recommend him!

I really enjoyed his class, even though I have a hard time with math generally. Very helpful, especially his weekly tests. I felt prepared for statistics when the class ended. He also happens to be a fascinating person (in and out of class). Very approachable. Highly recommend.
nice prof! explains everything really clearly and was very helpful. would recommend to others
